BR_text.BRsummary: Value of kfctl version is hardcoded and not representative of the actual build.
BR_text.BRdescription:
I built kfctl in my branch
 Here's the output of kfctl version from the resulting build
 <denchmark-code>kftcl version
 v20181207-4e7f4ed-198-gaeea303e-dirty-03e65e
 </denchmark-code>
 
 This doesn't match git describe
 <denchmark-code>git describe
 v0.4.0-rc.1-329-ge7d0b5a7
 </denchmark-code>
 
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/commit/e7d0b5a7467062e55fe7ca87a29e0ed19011f835>e7d0b5a</denchmark-link>
  is the commit I have checked out. Not sure what the other number refers to.
 /cc <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kkasravi>@kkasravi</denchmark-link>
  <denchmark-link:https://github.com/gabrielwen>@gabrielwen</denchmark-link>

comments_1.comment_text:
